activities: Innovative Discovery receives data pertaining to legal proceedings ranging from employee computer shares to internal corporate documentation from accounting, marketing, R&D or personnel departments: as well as a wide variety of information resulting from forensic analysis.  Data is also received via mail, email, File Transfer Protocol (FTP), forensic collection or person to person pickup or delivery.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: All complaints should refer issues needing attention to Innovative Discovery privacy officer, James Perkins (privacy@id-edd.com) for immediate consideration.  If the problem is not resolved, individuals are encouraged to contact EU DATA PROTECTION AUTHORITIES at (http://ec.europa.eu/justice/data-protection/bodies/authorities/index_en.htm) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
